original: induction 1; intros; auto. assert (step_ordered_dynamic_failure_star step_ordered_dynamic_failure_init (m, snd (snd (fst e))) (tl tr)) by (destruct e; simpl in *; auto). destruct a1, a2. - simpl in *. intuition; subst; tauto. - destruct d; simpl in *. + inv H7. * do_in_app. intuition. do_in_map. destruct H10. simpl in *. assert (n0 <> n) by (contradict H2; do_in_map; subst; auto). rewrite remove_neq_not_in in H10; auto. tauto. * do_in_map. destruct H8. simpl in *. assert (n0 <> n) by (contradict H2; do_in_map; subst; auto). rewrite remove_neq_not_in in H8; auto. tauto. + do_step_eq. apply IHclos_refl_trans2; auto. apply remove_not_in; auto.
